threat: If a remote attacker were able to perform a man-in-the-middle attack, this flaw could be exploited to view sensitive information.
A remote attacker could use this flaw to cause applications using telepathy-gabble to crash, resulting in a denial of service.
special:
The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:
After a standard system update you need to restart your session to make all
the necessary changes.
